title._content: [Oney S. A. Brock of Company I, 5th Virginia Cavalry Regiment with knife and sword] (LOC)

description._content: [Oney S. A. Brock of Company I, 5th Virginia Cavalry Regiment with knife and sword] 1862 April 27. 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.5 cm (case) + Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-94. Handwritten note in case: "Oney S. A. Brock born April the 19, 1843, this the year 1862 April the 27 [...] when I had my pretty shade taken." Photograph shows identified soldier, Oney (or Onie) Swepson A. Brock, who enlisted in Company I, 5th Virginia Cavalry Regiment, as a private and transferred to 15th Virginia Cavalry Regiment. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Purchased from: The Historical Shop, Metairie, La., 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Brock, Oney S. A.,--b. 1843. Confederate States of America.--Army.--Virginia Cavalry Regiment, 5th--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Confederate--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Confederate--1860-1870. Daggers & swords--1860-1870. Knives--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Confederate. Format: Manuscripts--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31542 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2710
